00061 Master::Master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue) : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_verbose(false), m_dfs_client(0), m_initialized(false) {
00062   Client *dfs_client;
00063   uint16_t port;
00064 
00065   m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00066 
00067   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(conn_mgr->get_comm(), props_ptr, &m_hyperspace_session_handler);
00068 
00069   if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00070     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00071     exit(1);
00072   }
00073 
00074   m_verbose = props_ptr->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00075 
00076   if ((port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Port", 0)) == 0) {
00077     HT_ERROR("Hypertable.Master.Port property not found in config file, exiting...");
00078     exit(1);
00079   }
00080 
00081   m_max_range_bytes = props_ptr->get_int64("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MaxBytes", 200000000LL);
00082 
00086   dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, props_ptr);
00087 
00088   if (m_verbose) {
00089     cout << "DfsBroker.Host=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Host", "") << endl;
00090     cout << "DfsBroker.Port=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Port", "") << endl;
00091     cout << "DfsBroker.Timeout=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Timeout", "") << endl;
00092   }
00093 
00094   if (!dfs_client->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00095     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00096     exit(1);
00097   }
00098 
00099   m_dfs_client = dfs_client;
00100 
00101   atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, 0);
00102 
00103   if (!initialize())
00104     exit(1);
00105 
00106   /* Read Last Table ID */
00107   {
00108     DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00109     HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00110     int ival;
00111     uint32_t lock_status;
00112     uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00113 
00114     m_master_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", oflags, null_handle_callback);
00115 
00116     m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_master_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &m_master_file_sequencer);
00117 
00118     if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00119       HT_ERROR("Unable to obtain lock on '/hypertable/master' - conflict");
00120       exit(1);
00121     }
00122 
00123     // Write master location in 'address' attribute, format is IP:port
00124     {
00125       String host_str, addr_str;
00126       struct hostent *he;
00127       InetAddr::get_hostname(host_str);
00128       if ((he = gethostbyname(host_str.c_str())) == 0) {
00129         HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining address for hostname '%s'", host_str.c_str());
00130         exit(1);
00131       }
00132       addr_str = String(inet_ntoa(*(struct in_addr *)*he->h_addr_list)) + ":" + (int)port;
00133       m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "address", addr_str.c_str(), strlen(addr_str.c_str()));
00134     }
00135 
00136     try {
00137       m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", valbuf);
00138       assert(valbuf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00139       memcpy(&ival, valbuf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00140     }
00141     catch (Exception &e) {
00142       if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND) {
00143         uint32_t table_id = 0;
00144         m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t));
00145         ival = 0;
00146       }
00147       else
00148         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00149     }
00150 
00151     atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, ival);
00152     if (m_verbose)
00153       cout << "Last Table ID: " << ival << endl;
00154   }
00155 
00159   scan_servers_directory();
00160 
00161   master_gc_start(props_ptr, m_threads, m_metadata_table_ptr, m_dfs_client);
00162 }

00185 void Master::server_left(const String &location) {
00186   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00187   uint32_t lock_status;
00188   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00189   ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.find(location);
00190   String hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00191 
00192   if (iter == m_server_map.end()) {
00193     HT_WARNF("Server (%s) not found in map", location.c_str());
00194     return;
00195   }
00196 
00197   // if we're about to delete the item pointing to the server map iterator, then advance the iterator
00198   if (iter == m_server_map_iter)
00199     m_server_map_iter++;
00200 
00201   m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00202 
00203   if (lock_status != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00204     HT_INFOF("Unable to obtain lock on server file %s, ignoring...", location.c_str());
00205     return;
00206   }
00207 
00208   m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00209   m_hyperspace_ptr->close((*iter).second->hyperspace_handle);
00210   m_server_map.erase(iter);
00211   if (m_server_map.empty())
00212     m_no_servers_cond.notify_all();
00213 
00214   HT_INFOF("RangeServer lost it's lock on file %s, deleting ...", hsfname.c_str());
00215   cout << flush;
00216 
00220 }

00231   HT_INFO_OUT << "Entering create_table for " << tablename << HT_END;

00236   catch (Exception &e) {

00249 void Master::get_schema(ResponseCallbackGetSchema *cb, const char *tablename) {
00250   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00251   String errmsg;
00252   DynamicBuffer schemabuf(0);
00253   uint64_t handle;
00254   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00255 
00256   try {
00257 
00261     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile)) {
00262       cb->error(Error::TABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST, tablename);
00263       return;
00264     }
00265 
00269     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00270 
00274     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", schemabuf);
00275 
00276     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00277 
00278     cb->response((char *)schemabuf.base);
00279 
00280     if (m_verbose) {
00281       HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched schema (length=%d) for table '%s'", strlen((char *)schemabuf.base), tablename);
00282     }
00283 
00284   }
00285   catch (Exception &e) {
00286     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00287     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00288   }
00289 }

00296 void Master::register_server(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *location, struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00297   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00298   ServerMap::iterator iter;
00299   struct sockaddr_in alias;
00300   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00301   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00302   uint32_t lock_status;
00303   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00304   String hsfname;
00305   bool exists = false;
00306 
00307   try {
00308     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00309 
00310     HT_EXPECT((iter = m_server_map.find(location)) == m_server_map.end(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00311 
00312     rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00313     rs_state->location = location;
00314     rs_state->addr = addr;
00315 
00316     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(location, alias)) {
00317       HT_ERRORF("Problem creating address from location '%s'", location);
00318       cb->error(Error::INVALID_METADATA, (String)"Unable to convert location '" + location + "' to address");
00319       return;
00320     }
00321     else {
00322       Comm *comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00323       comm->set_alias(addr, alias);
00324     }
00325 
00326     hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00327 
00328     lock_file_handler = new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00329 
00330     rs_state->hyperspace_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler);
00331 
00332     m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00333 
00334     if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00335       HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...", hsfname.c_str());
00336       m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00337       m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00338     }
00339     else
00340       m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
00341 
00342     {
00343       String addr_str;
00344       HT_INFOF("Server Registered %s -> %s", location, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, addr));
00345       cout << flush;
00346     }
00347 
00348     cb->response_ok();
00349 
00350   }
00351   catch (Exception &e) {
00352     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00353     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00354     return;
00355   }
00356 
00360   if (!m_initialized) {
00361     TableIdentifier table;
00362     RangeSpec range;
00363     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00364 
00368     {
00369       String metadata_schema_file = System::install_dir + "/conf/METADATA.xml";
00370       off_t schemalen;
00371       const char *schemastr = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(metadata_schema_file.c_str(), &schemalen);
00372 
00373       try {
00374         create_table("METADATA", schemastr);
00375       }
00376       catch (Exception &e) {
00377         if (e.code() != Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS) {
00378           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00379           HT_ABORT;
00380         }
00381         exists = true;
00382       }
00383     }
00384 
00388     m_metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), m_hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00389 
00390     // If table exists, then ranges should already have been assigned
00391     if (exists) {
00392       m_initialized = true;
00393       return;
00394     }
00395 
00396     m_metadata_table_ptr->get_identifier(&table);
00397     table.name = "METADATA";
00398 
00402     range.start_row = 0;
00403     range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00404 
00405     try {
00406       RangeState range_state;
00407       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00408       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state);
00409     }
00410     catch (Exception &e) {
00411       String addr_str;
00412       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00413                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, alias), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00414     }
00415 
00416 
00421     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00422     KeySpec key;
00423     String metadata_key_str;
00424 
00425     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00426 
00427     metadata_key_str = String("0:") + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00428     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00429     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00430     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00431     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00432 
00433     try {
00434       key.column_family = "StartRow";
00435       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)Key::END_ROOT_ROW, strlen(Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00436       mutator_ptr->flush();
00437     }
00438     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00439       // TODO: propagate exception
00440       HT_ERRORF("METADATA update error (row_key = %s) - %s : %s", metadata_key_str.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00441       exit(1);
00442     }
00443 
00447     range.start_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00448     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00449 
00450     try {
00451       RangeState range_state;
00452       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00453       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state);
00454     }
00455     catch (Exception &e) {
00456       String addr_str;
00457       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00458                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, alias), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00459     }
00460 
00461     m_initialized = true;
00462   }
00463 
00464 }

00472 void Master::report_split(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit) {
00473   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00474   RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00475 
00476   HT_INFOF("Entering report_split for %s[%s:%s].", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00477 
00478   cb->response_ok();
00479 
00480   {
00481     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00482     if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00483       m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00484     assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00485     memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr), sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00486     HT_INFOF("Assigning newly reported range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00487     m_server_map_iter++;
00488   }
00489 
00490   //cb->get_address(addr);
00491 
00492   try {
00493     RangeState range_state;
00494     range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00495     rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, transfer_log_dir, range_state, 0);
00496     HT_INFOF("report_split for %s[%s:%s] successful.", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00497   }
00498   catch (Exception &e) {
00499     String addr_str;
00500     HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[%s:%s] at server %s - %s",
00501               table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, addr), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00502   }
00503 
00504 }

00506 void Master::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *table_name, bool if_exists) {
00507   int saved_error = Error::OK;
00508   String err_msg;
00509   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_name;
00510   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00511   int ival;
00512   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00513   uint64_t handle;
00514   String table_name_str = table_name;
00515 
00516   HT_INFOF("Entering drop_table for %s", table_name);
00517   std::cout << flush;
00518 
00519   try {
00520 
00524     try {
00525       handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00526     }
00527     catch (Exception &e) {
00528       if (if_exists && e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME) {
00529         cb->response_ok();
00530         return;
00531       }
00532       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, (String)"Problem opening file '" + table_file + "'");
00533     }
00534 
00535     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00536 
00537     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00538 
00539     assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00540 
00541     memcpy(&ival, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00542 
00543     {
00544       char start_row[16];
00545       char end_row[16];
00546       TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00547       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00548       Cell cell;
00549       String location_str;
00550       std::set<String> unique_locations;
00551       TableIdentifier table;
00552       RowInterval ri;
00553 
00554       table.name = table_name_str.c_str();
00555       table.id = ival;
00556       table.generation = 0;
00557 
00558       sprintf(start_row, "%d:", ival);
00559       sprintf(end_row, "%d:%s", ival, Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00560 
00561       scan_spec.row_limit = 0;
00562       scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00563       scan_spec.columns.clear();
00564       scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00565 
00566       ri.start = start_row;
00567       ri.end = end_row;
00568       scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00569 
00570       scan_spec.time_interval.first = 0;
00571       scan_spec.time_interval.second = 0;
00572 
00573       int max_wait=5;
00574 
00575       while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00576         poll(0, 0, 1000);
00577         max_wait--;
00578       }
00579 
00580       if (!m_metadata_table_ptr)
00581         HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS, "Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00582       
00583       scanner_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00584 
00585       while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00586         location_str = String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00587         boost::trim(location_str);
00588         if (location_str != "" && location_str != "!")
00589           unique_locations.insert(location_str);
00590       }
00591 
00592       if (!unique_locations.empty()) {
00593         DropTableDispatchHandler sync_handler(table, m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00594         RangeServerStatePtr state_ptr;
00595         ServerMap::iterator iter;
00596 
00597         {
00598           boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00599           for (std::set<String>::iterator loc_iter = unique_locations.begin(); loc_iter != unique_locations.end(); loc_iter++) {
00600             if ((iter = m_server_map.find(*loc_iter)) != m_server_map.end()) {
00601               sync_handler.add((*iter).second->addr);
00602             }
00603             else {
00604               saved_error = Error::RANGESERVER_UNAVAILABLE;
00605               err_msg = *loc_iter;
00606             }
00607           }
00608         }
00609 
00610         if (!sync_handler.wait_for_completion()) {
00611           std::vector<DropTableDispatchHandler::ErrorResult> errors;
00612           sync_handler.get_errors(errors);
00613           for (size_t i=0; i<errors.size(); i++) {
00614             HT_WARNF("drop table error - %s - %s", errors[i].msg.c_str(), Error::get_text(errors[i].error));
00615           }
00616           cb->error(errors[0].error, errors[0].msg);
00617           return;
00618         }
00619       }
00620 
00621     }
00622 
00623     if (saved_error != Error::OK) {
00624       HT_ERRORF("DROP TABLE failed '%s' - %s", err_msg.c_str(), Error::get_text(saved_error));
00625       cb->error(saved_error, err_msg);
00626       return;
00627     }
00628     else
00629       m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(table_file.c_str());
00630 
00631     HT_INFOF("DROP TABLE '%s' id=%d success", table_name_str.c_str(), ival);
00632     cb->response_ok();
00633     cout << flush;
00634 
00635   }
00636   catch (Exception &e) {
00637     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00638     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00639   }
00640 }
00641 
00642   void Master::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00643     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00644 
00645     HT_INFO("SHUTDOWN");
00646     std::cout << endl;
00647 
00648     {
00649       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00650       boost::xtime expire_time;
00651 
00652       // issue shutdown commands
00653       for (ServerMap::iterator iter = m_server_map.begin(); iter != m_server_map.end(); iter++)
00654         rsc.shutdown((*iter).second->addr);
00655 
00656       boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00657       expire_time.sec += (int64_t)30;
00658 
00659       m_no_servers_cond.timed_wait(lock, expire_time);
00660       if (!m_server_map.empty()) {
00661         String err_msg = format("%d RangeServers failed to shutdown", (int)m_server_map.size());
00662         cb->error(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, err_msg);
00663         return;
00664       }
00665 
00666       m_hyperspace_ptr = 0;
00667     }
00668 
00669     cb->response_ok();
00670 
00671     poll(0, 0, 1000);
00672 
00673     _exit(0);
00674 
00675   }

00677 
00678 void
00679 Master::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr) {
00680   String finalschema = "";
00681   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename;
00682   string table_basedir;
00683   string agdir;
00684   Schema *schema = 0;
00685   list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *aglist;
00686   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00687   uint64_t handle;
00688   uint32_t table_id;
00689 
00693   if (m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tablefile))
00694     HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS, tablename);
00695 
00699   schema = Schema::new_instance(schemastr, strlen(schemastr));
00700   if (!schema->is_valid())
00701     HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_BAD_SCHEMA, schema->get_error_string());
00702 
00703   schema->assign_ids();
00704   schema->render(finalschema);
00705 
00709   handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00710 
00714   {
00715     if (!strcmp(tablename, "METADATA"))
00716       table_id = 0;
00717     else {
00718       table_id = (uint32_t)atomic_inc_return(&m_last_table_id);
00719       m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t));
00720     }
00721 
00722     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t));
00723   }
00724 
00728   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "schema", finalschema.c_str(), strlen(finalschema.c_str()));
00729 
00730   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00731 
00735   table_basedir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + tablename + "/";
00736   aglist = schema->get_access_group_list();
00737 
00738   for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_it = aglist->begin();
00739       ag_it != aglist->end(); ag_it++) {
00740     agdir = table_basedir + (*ag_it)->name;
00741     m_dfs_client->mkdirs(agdir);
00742   }
00743 
00747   if (table_id != 0) {
00748     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00749     KeySpec key;
00750     String metadata_key_str;
00751     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00752     int max_wait=5;
00753 
00754     while (!m_metadata_table_ptr && max_wait) {
00755       poll(0, 0, 1000);
00756       max_wait--;
00757     }
00758 
00759     if (!m_metadata_table_ptr)
00760       HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_NO_RANGESERVERS, "Aborting DropTable because no RangeServers have registered");
00761 
00762     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00763 
00764     metadata_key_str = String("") + table_id + ":" + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00765     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00766     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00767     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00768     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00769 
00770     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00771     mutator_ptr->set(0, key, 0, 0);
00772     mutator_ptr->flush();
00773 
00778     TableIdentifier table;
00779     RangeSpec range;
00780     uint64_t soft_limit;
00781     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00782 
00783     table.name = tablename;
00784     table.id = table_id;
00785     table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00786 
00787     range.start_row = 0;
00788     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00789 
00790     {
00791       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00792       if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00793         m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00794       assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00795       memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr), sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00796       HT_INFOF("Assigning first range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00797       m_server_map_iter++;
00798       soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes / std::min(64, (int)m_server_map.size()*2);
00799     }
00800 
00801     try {
00802       RangeState range_state;
00803       range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00804       rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, 0, range_state);
00805     }
00806     catch (Exception &e) {
00807       String addr_str;
00808       String err_msg = format("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00809                               table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addr_str, addr), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00810       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, err_msg);
00811     }
00812   }
00813 
00814   if (m_verbose) {
00815     HT_INFOF("Successfully created table '%s' ID=%d", tablename, table_id);
00816   }
00817   
00818 }
00819 
00820 
00825 bool Master::initialize() {
00826   uint64_t handle;
00827   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00828 
00829   try {
00830     
00831     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable")) {
00832       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable"))
00833         return false;
00834     }
00835 
00836     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers")) {
00837       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/servers"))
00838         return false;
00839     }
00840 
00841     if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/tables")) {
00842       if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/tables"))
00843         return false;
00844     }
00845 
00846     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00847 
00848     m_master_file_handle = handle;
00849 
00853     uint32_t table_id = 0;
00854     m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t));
00855 
00856     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00857     m_master_file_handle = 0;
00858 
00862     handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, null_handle_callback);
00863 
00864     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00865 
00866     HT_INFO("Successfully Initialized Hypertable.");
00867 
00868     return true;
00869 
00870   }
00871   catch (Exception &e) {
00872     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00873     return false;
00874   }
00875 }
00876 
00877 
00881 void Master::scan_servers_directory() {
00882   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00883   HandleCallbackPtr lock_file_handler;
00884   std::vector<struct DirEntry> listing;
00885   uint32_t lock_status;
00886   LockSequencer lock_sequencer;
00887   RangeServerStatePtr rs_state;
00888   uint32_t oflags;
00889   String hsfname;
00890 
00891   try {
00892 
00896     m_servers_dir_callback_ptr = new ServersDirectoryHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00897 
00898     m_servers_dir_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/servers", OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_servers_dir_callback_ptr);
00899 
00900     m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(m_servers_dir_handle, listing);
00901 
00902     oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00903 
00904     for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00905 
00906       rs_state = new RangeServerState();
00907       rs_state->location = listing[i].name;
00908 
00909       hsfname = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + listing[i].name;
00910 
00911       lock_file_handler = new ServerLockFileHandler(rs_state, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00912 
00913       rs_state->hyperspace_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsfname, oflags, lock_file_handler);
00914 
00915       m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(rs_state->hyperspace_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &lock_sequencer);
00916 
00917       if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00918         HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...", hsfname.c_str());
00919         m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsfname);
00920         m_hyperspace_ptr->close(rs_state->hyperspace_handle);
00921       }
00922       else {
00923         m_server_map[rs_state->location] = rs_state;
00924       }
00925     }
00926   }
00927   catch (Exception &e) {
00928     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00929     HT_ABORT;
00930   }
00931 }
00932 
00933 
00937 bool Master::create_hyperspace_dir(const String &dir) {
00938 
00939   try {
00940 
00941     if (m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(dir))
00942       return true;
00943 
00944     m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir(dir);
00945 
00946   }
00947   catch (Exception &e) {
00948     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Problem creating hyperspace directory '" << dir << "'" << HT_END;
00949     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00950     return false;
00951   }
00952 
00953   return true;
00954 }
00955 
00956 void Master::join() {
00957   m_app_queue_ptr->join();
00958   m_threads.join_all();
00959 }
